resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74545</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>fcf30381-4b13-4539-b314-47f5d22207ac#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Nílusi víziló</string>
            <string language="en">Nile hippopotamus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nil Hippopotamus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hippopotamus du Nil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hippopotamus de Nile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hippopotamus del Nilo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hippopotamus του Νείλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hippopotamus del Nilo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A párosujjú patások közé tartozik. Az afrikai szavannákon, a folyók, vízpartok mentén él.</string>
            <string language="en">It belongs to even-toed ungulates. It lives on savannas along river, bank in Africa. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  párosujjú patások,  Afrika,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammalian, placentalia, even-toed ungulates, Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Er gehört gleichmäßig-even-toed ungulates. 
Er lebt auf savannas entlang Fluß, Bank in Afrika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Il appartient aux ungulates égal-bottés avec la 
pointe du pied. Il vit sur des savannas le long du fleuve, 
banque en Afrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pertence aos ungulates uniforme-even-toed. 
Vive em savannas ao longo do rio, banco em África.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appartiene ai ungulates uniforme-piantati. 
Vive sui savannas lungo il fiume, banca in Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανήκει ομαλός- ungulates. Ζει στα savannas 
κατά μήκος του ποταμού, τράπεζα στην Αφρική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pertenece a los ungulates uniforme-tocados con la
punta del pie. Vive en savannas a lo largo del río, batería en
África.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetier-, placentalia, gleichmäßig-even-toed ungulates, 
Afrika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifère, placentalia, ungulates égal-bottés avec la pointe 
du pied, Afrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mammalian, placentalia, ungulates uniforme-even-toed, África</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammifero, placentalia, ungulates uniforme-piantati, Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαστοφόρος, placentalia, ομαλός- ungulates, Αφρική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamífero, placentalia, ungulates uniforme-tocados con la punta 
del pie, África</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74545</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=fcf30381-4b13-4539-b314-47f5d22207ac&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
